TopicTitle: Dumb Stuff for KSP: Naten Projects (On Hold)

Articles.Content:
Welcome to Naten Projects. Here, I'm making stuff. Have fun with it.

I'm now working on better things for this thread. I'll also make better nose cones. Don't expect much from me, I'll be thinking and modelling and stuff. Thanks.

PRODUCT(S) HAVE LIMITED WARRANTY

Warning: this is not a snack, and should never be played with unless you're equipped with good medical insurance, a great doctor, and a great lawyer. Oh, come on, you're really not going to read this. Maybe you will, I'm not psychic. So... (hopefully, you won't read this, at this point) HUEHUEHUE POOP

Okay, here's a nose cone. Put it on your planes. Download it from its Spaceport page here.

Yes, I do have pictures. In case you want to see it.

New, less poopy model, coming soon...?

Have fun.

More will come soon, so please stay tuned.

All rights reserved.

I am going to take a break from this project for a bit. I have no ideas now. I am terrible at texturing. I am bad at modelling. I am bad at making ideas. I just need to think of something to do.

Edited October 6, 2013 by Naten

To Be Brutally honest.. It looks like a hershys kiss stapled to the front of the plane.. OR..

Oh Dear.. The End of a Dog poo.

So.. I Think you need redesign
Um, yes indeed I agree that it doesn't looks very nice lol... maybe some textures and a little bit of google images surfing to see if you get any better designs

It shouldn't droop so much.

The only reason I can think why you'd have it like that is because of certain real life examples you might have seen like Concorde or the MiG-21. But those were articulated. In the case of the Concorde the nose would be depressed during take-offs and landings so the pilot can have maximum visibility. But during actual supersonic flight you'd want that to be as straight as possible. And pointier.

So, long, straight and pointy. And textured. Please learn UV mapping and slap a texture on that sucker.

You want to be popular mate and get lots of downloads? Make some decent plane wheels. Seriously there is *one* wheel, that fold up white one. We need variety of lengths, fold up types etc. I'm so tired of designing planes around the only wheel available. Wings, noses, fins - all that stuff is there in bin fulls... but only 1 wheel.
If you want to make a nose, it should be straight. Because its not very aerodynamic to droop.

You want to be popular mate and get lots of downloads? Make some decent plane wheels. Seriously there is *one* wheel, that fold up white one. We need variety of lengths, fold up types etc. I'm so tired of designing planes around the only wheel available. Wings, noses, fins - all that stuff is there in bin fulls... but only 1 wheel.

Umm...TT Wheels pack has landing gear as does the Firespitter mod.

ON TOPIC: I have to agree with the other posters, no droop, pointier and needs a texture.

I'm guessing that the model is based on the Su27:

It *is* slightly asymmetric, but only slightly, it looks exagerrated as it is at a different angle-of-attack to the rest of the fuselage. To look the part the mod definitely needs some adjustment to the model...moar pointy/less droopy.

Uh-oh, lots of stuff has happened while I was gone. :c

And I forgot a license. Crap. :c :c :c

I was inspired by the Concorde's nose in its down position. I don't know.

knowhatimsayin?

Anyways. Yes, I will tweak the model. I was not checking the Forums for a bit. Lots of stuff can happen while you're gone, I guess.

Naten

I'm making a new model.

Content subject to change when released.

And textured. Please learn UV mapping and slap a texture on that sucker.

This version was textured, the picture is old. I'm going to wait on the texture until I get a whole set thingy of parts.
